portfolio_list.title: DigiAsia 2022 Conference
portfolio_list.description: DigiAsia 2022 adopted the theme “Web3 Rhapsody.” The NFT design and issuance were led by the startup Metartemis, delivering 1,080 unique variations distributed to participants. By collecting and interacting with these NFTs, attendees not only experienced the process firsthand but also became part of the conference ecosystem.

image.alt: Web3 Baby NFT Charity Sale and Avatars

portfolio_list.title: Web3 Baby NFT Charity Sale and Avatars
portfolio_list.description: A Taiwan-based team showcased distinctive innovations at DigiAsia. OSENSE combined 3D and XR to create a metaverse exhibition hall, while NFTs served as admission passes that merged collection with interaction. Metartemis handled NFT design and blockchain integration, bringing an inventive ticketing experience that became a highlight of the Web3 ecosystem.

portfolio_list.title: DigiAsia Onsite Coverage: Exploring Web3 Rhapsody
portfolio_list.description: Centered on the theme “Web3 Rhapsody,” DigiAsia 2022 featured extensive NFT applications. Metartemis designed and issued more than 1,080 unique versions, distributed via airdrop to attendees. This initiative gave participants collectible value while immersing them in practical Web3 scenarios and digital ownership experiences.

portfolio_list.title: Web3 Entertainment Experience
portfolio_list.description: DigiAsia 2022 integrated NFTs and metaverse concepts to showcase innovative possibilities. Metartemis created 1,080 DigiBaby NFTs airdropped to participants, offering ongoing utilities. In collaboration with HTC VIVE ORIGINALS, guests experienced the BEATDAY holographic concert and Meixiu Group’s performance, blending virtual and real elements into a unique immersive show.

portfolio_list.title: Zombie Club
portfolio_list.description: HTC VIVE’s content brand VIVE ORIGINALS partnered with a fashion magazine and Edison Chen’s NFT project “ZombieClub” to launch the BEATDAY metaverse event “NFT Zombie Party feat. ZombieClub.” Audiences could embody their NFT avatars inside the virtual party, enjoying immersive interactions and a groundbreaking digital entertainment experience.
